title: Retro Future Music Pack
description: 20 high quality music tracks  including loop versions of each track, bringing the good old synthie times to the cyberspaced neon lighted future.
longDescription:
IMAscore’s Retro Future Music Pack contains 20 high quality music tracks including loop versions of each track, bringing the good old synthie times to the cyberspaced neon lighted future. All tracks are royalty free, mixed and mastered, ready to use!


PREVIEW: https://youtu.be/PWR5ABV29lI


Content:

  1. Choose Your Level [03:21] + Loop [03:14]
  2. Other World [02:34] + Loop [02:24]
  3. Electro Funk [02:54] + Loop [02:50]
  4. Delorean [03:30] + Loop [03:27]
  5. Artificial Consciousness [02:19] + Loop [02:08]
  6. Top Gun [02:38] + Loop [02:32]
  7. Dark City [02:28] + Loop [02:19]
  8. Retro Moves [03:28] + Loop [03:19]
  9. Tron [02:00] + Loop [01:50]
  10. Digital Life [04:25] + Loop [04:13]
  11. Cruise Tonight [03:06] + Loop [02:58]
  12. Total Control [02:45] + Loop [02:29]
  13. Room 13 [02:33] + Loop [02:29]
  14. Silicon Lifeforms [03:00] + Loop [02:47]
  15. Neon [01:55] + Loop [01:52]
  16. Underground [02:55] + Loop [02:45]
  17. Miami Nights [02:56] + Loop [02:51]
  18. Substance [03:12] + Loop [03:06]
  19. Neon Lights [02:13] + Loop [02:04]
  20. Transflux [03:28] + Loop [03:12]
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Audio Wavs: 40
  • Audio Cues: 20 (choose between loop and single track version)
  • Format: 44.1 kHz, 16 bit, Stereo, WAV
  • Size: 1.21 GB
  • Does music loop: Yes
  • Minutes of audio provided: 1h 52min 29sec
  • Supported Platforms: All


Who we are

IMAscore is a leading audio production studio, bringing you cutting edge music and sound since 2009. We are a team of composers and sound designers and proved our versatility with hundreds of projects we’re proud to be a part of, from Trailer Music for blockbuster movies or AAA games to all those small and big projects from all kinds of areas.

And you know what? We love games – we always did! That’s why we want to give your projects the high-quality audio they deserve, with releases designed to meet the needs of the game industry. Rest assured: This is just the beginning of a highscore beating, emotion blasting and goosebumps creating relationship!

In case you don’t find what you’re looking for in the asset packs we’re offering right now, we know how to handle your very individual ideas and wishes! You won’t regret getting in touch with us!
